response.overview: The first ever DVD release of a live performance by Natanil features his acclaimed stage production, CATHEDRAL, filmed from 18 to 21 March 2010 at Theatre of Marcellus, Emperors Palace. Natanil transports his audience on a journey through time, taking a unique look at the age-old phenomenon of mankind being captured, seduced, threatened and destroyed by his own creations. With original music ranging from pop, rock and soul to old-world torch songs and jazz, the show also includes a collection of typical Natanil monologues in English and Afrikaans! Fantastical, hysterical, honest, different, truly funny and always entertaining, this is the world according to Natanil. Includes Nataniel monologues in English & Afrikaans!
response.title: Nataniël: Cathedral
